alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:40PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morgan and northwestern Summit Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 339 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coalville, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coalville, East Canyon State Park, Wanship, Henefer, Emory, Hoytsville, Croydon, Echo, Rockport State Park and Echo Reservoir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 108 and 119. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 153 and 181. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
